only_new_input.help_text: If true, skip downloading inputs that already have corresponding outputs in the output directory. Requires output naming parameters to be set.

preexisting_output_tag.help_text: Folder name under outdir that contains existing outputs to check for (e.g. 'raw_fastqs'). Required when only_new_input is true.

existing_output_extension.help_text: File extension used to discover existing output files (e.g. '.fastq.gz', '.fa.gz', '.cram'). Required when only_new_input is true.

existing_output_id_suffix.help_text: Suffix used to derive an ID from an existing output filename. The filename is split on this string and the first part is treated as the ID (e.g. '_1.fastq.gz'). Required when only_new_input is true.
